backend/venv.description: Virtual environment contains langgraph v1.0.5, langgraph-checkpoint v3.0.1, langgraph-checkpoint-sqlite v3.0.1. Use backend/venv/bin/python to run Python with these packages.

backend/agent_graph.py.description: Agent graph compiles successfully with LangGraph 1.x. Uses StateGraph, START, END from langgraph.graph, ToolNode and tools_condition from langgraph.prebuilt. Compiles with checkpointer=None for stateless operation.

app/core/llm.py.description: LangChain-Anthropic 1.3.0 is fully compatible with the existing llm.py implementation. ChatAnthropic supports both 'model' and 'model_name' parameters. bind_tools(), with_structured_output(), ainvoke(), and astream() all work correctly.

backend/requirements.txt.description: LangGraph 1.x requires separate langgraph-checkpoint-sqlite package for SqliteSaver. Import path: from langgraph.checkpoint.sqlite import SqliteSaver. Also available: MemorySaver from langgraph.checkpoint.memory

backend/translator_graph.py.description: translator_graph.py compiles successfully with LangChain 0.3.x - uses StateGraph, START, END from langgraph.graph, HumanMessage from langchain_core.messages, ChatAnthropic from langchain_anthropic. Simple single-node graph pattern for medical translation.

backend/app/core/graph.py.description: Main clinical workflow graph compiles successfully with LangGraph 1.x. Uses StateGraph, START, END from langgraph.graph, add_messages from langgraph.graph.message. Conditional routing via add_conditional_edges works correctly. Compiled with checkpointer=None for stateless operation.

backend/tests/test_graph.py.description: Graph unit tests created with 14 tests covering StateGraph imports, basic graph compilation, conditional edges, @tool decorator, ToolNode integration, checkpointer options (None for stateless, MemorySaver for stateful), and project graph patterns (agent, translator, clinical).

backend/tests/test_state.py.description: State unit tests created with 18 tests covering message class instantiation (HumanMessage, AIMessage, SystemMessage, ToolMessage), serialization with model_dump/model_validate, add_messages reducer from langgraph.graph.message, state definition patterns (TypedDict, Annotated with operator.add and add_messages), and message type checking.

backend/tests/test_tools_base.py.description: Tool-related tests created with 49 tests covering: @tool decorator (sync/async, custom names, docstrings, multiple params), BaseTool subclassing, ToolException handling, ToolNode creation and integration, tools_condition routing, and project-specific patterns from agent_graph.py.

backend/tests/test_multiformat_pdf_suppo.description: RAG pipeline tests require environment variables: SUPABASE_URL, SUPABASE_KEY, ANTHROPIC_API_KEY, PUBMED_EMAIL, OPENAI_API_KEY. Use dummy values for testing since services are mocked. Run with: PYTHONPATH=.. SUPABASE_URL="https://test.supabase.co" SUPABASE_KEY="test-key" ANTHROPIC_API_KEY="test-key" PUBMED_EMAIL="test@example.com" OPENAI_API_KEY="test-key" pytest tests/*.py -v

backend/tests/test_api_integration.py.description: Integration tests verify FastAPI endpoints with mocked LangGraph graph_app.ainvoke(). Tests use TestClient for in-memory testing, dependency_overrides for auth, and AsyncMock for graph responses. All 25 integration tests pass with upgraded LangChain/LangGraph dependencies.
